nodes.text: Senoloro was a city located on the planet Auratera's equator, on a large island-like plain formed by six surrounding inland seas and their rivers. At 30,000, its population was the highest of any of Auratera's cities. Most of Senoloro's residents were human or Duros. Senoloro hosted the planet's largest spaceport, with only a few hangars which serviced old, rarely-used freighters.
The city was ruled by Governor-for-Life Lerella Rosral.
